named-query.name: Meal.delete
named-query.query: DELETE FROM Meal m WHERE m.id=:id AND m.user.id=:userId

named-query.name: Meal.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Meal m WHERE m.user.id=:userId ORDER BY m.dateTime DESC

named-query.name: Meal.getBetween
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Meal m WHERE m.user.id=:userId AND m.dateTime >=:startDateTime AND m.dateTime<:endDateTime ORDER BY m.dateTime DESC
